Articles.Content:
I guess this is a forum game... or may be in fanworks.

Answer the request in the above post, and then tell the next post what screenshot to to post.

The screenshots folder has all of your screenshots numbered. Any random pics may occur. So if someone told me to post pic #5512 i would post this:

( not even sure what this is)

So, to the user below, post your screenshot number 589

Well, I don't think I have 589 screenshots, so I'll just give my most recent:

I took this today when delivering some solar panels to my Mun space station.

User below me, give me snapshot 100!

I request screenshot #69 hehe

Here's screenshot #100, a picture of Eve and Gilly

I don't have a screenshot 100 yet.

Next user, post your first screenshot you ever took. In the first version you played.

I could not find my 2nd screenshot. instead, i will show you my earliest know screenshot.

Where's YOUR earliest known screenshot?

Edited August 6, 2014 by Souper

I think I've deleted my first screenshot which was in the demo version.

Here's my first Mun landing (with a failed space station part) :

Post your first Mun landing.

First Mun landing in the 0.18 Demo

Post your screenshot #42

Screenshot 42 appears to be of Dudrie Kerman bouncing across the surface of the Mun.

Post screenshot #1

It took me a while to realize that I could take screenshots.

Screenshot #76

My .24 screen shot #72 is....

My first .24 Duna landing

Post your screen shot #100

I generally put new KSP installations in a new folder, so I have multiple of most numbers, but I actually only had one of #100. This is me attaching a fuel reserve to a station with the help of a new version of my Crew Transport (in 0.23.5).

Next is 1337, or if that's too high number 96 (you better have at least that many by now).

Screenshot #1337 is my Mun arch exploration rover driving off a cliff. Interesting...

Next is screenshot #497 (or if you don't have that many, #82)

I only have 9 screenshots. I clear the folder out regularly, and only save the ones that I have a chance of ever wanting to see again.

So here's #8 and #2 because I can't do 497, 82, or 4, 9 and 7 (because I don't have a screenshot9)

8 is looking down on KSC through clouds and fire during reentry.

2 is because I was trying to figure out why contract payouts in one game were so low, and those in another were so high.

Next person, take the number of screenshots you have and cut the number in half. Round down and post that one.

The boxplane I constructed that works with FAR installed*.

* May or may not require six reaction wheels and Mechjeb for proper control. Do not attempt flight at speeds above 60 meters per second.

Screenshot #152

Edited August 8, 2014 by Vaporo

I hacked in a ship from EVE Online to see how the scale compared.

Next is number 0.

First 0.24 screenshot, was playing with RSS and managed a suborbital flight because i underestimated the power needed to get to orbit...

Next is number 25!

Edited August 9, 2014 by SlimeCrusher

I have two of those:

First is 0.23.5 when I looked directly down the barrel of a nuclear engine and gave myself brain cancer; second is from just today when I was trying to get reference shots to compare the sizes of my motherships from the last few versions (this one happens to be the newest and is still a WIP).

Next comes number 39.
